Producer: Alastair Burlingham, Randall Emmett, George Furla, Gary Raskin, Ceasar Richbow, Mark Stewart, Chad A. Verdi, James Cullen Bressack
Production Co: Grindstone Studios, BondIt Media Capital, Emmett/Furla/Oasis Films, Buffalo 8 Productions, Verdi Productions
Synopsis: Oscar-winner Mel Gibson brings this explosive cyber-thriller to life. The action begins as IT expert Friar (Kevin Dillon, Poseidon) finds a hair-trigger bomb strapped to his desk chair. An unseen hacker orders him to steal digital funds online--or have his daughter abducted. As a fearless bomb expert (Gibson) arrives on the scene, the hacker frames Friar as the bomber. The tension mounts as Friar races to clear his name and expose the real terrorist--without getting himself blown to smithereens.
Title: Hot Seat
